price: Allah atoranya Intumwa mu bamalayika no mu bantu. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Uwumva cyane, Ubona bihebuje.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
